t:
As the rape victim described the rapist, the sketch artist drew him on the pad.



The artist's horror grew as the details from the victim slowly filled up the pad with her husband's face.
c:
It was her husband, all along.



#rape #rapist #victim #sketchartist #criminal #husband #crime #drawing





If it was ambiguous, it was intended. Whose husband, you ask; the victim's or the artist's? Think, whatever you interpret.
